# Excalibur

> A high-performance .NET framework for messaging, event sourcing, CQRS, and compliance â€” distributed as NuGet packages. Start with `Excalibur.Dispatch` for messaging, add domain modeling, event sourcing, and sagas as your architecture requires. 75+ packages.

## Quick Start

- [LLM Quick Reference](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/reference/llm-reference): Compact reference for AI coding agents (start here)
- [Introduction](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/intro): Framework overview and package catalog
- [Getting Started](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/getting-started/): Install and create your first handler in 5 minutes

## Core Concepts

- [Actions & Handlers](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/core-concepts/actions-and-handlers): Message types (IDispatchAction, IDispatchEvent) and handler patterns
- [Message Context](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/core-concepts/message-context): Correlation, tenant, and metadata propagation
- [Results & Errors](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/core-concepts/results-and-errors): IMessageResult, error handling, problem details
- [Dependency Injection](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/core-concepts/dependency-injection): DI registration with AddDispatch()
- [Configuration](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/core-concepts/configuration): Options pattern and IOptions<T>

## Pipeline & Middleware

- [Pipeline](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/pipeline/): Request pipeline stages and ordering
- [Middleware](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/middleware/): Built-in and custom middleware (DispatchMiddlewareBase)

## Transports

- [Choosing a Transport](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/transports/choosing-a-transport): Comparison guide
- [RabbitMQ](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/transports/rabbitmq)
- [Kafka](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/transports/kafka)
- [Azure Service Bus](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/transports/azure-service-bus)
- [AWS SQS](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/transports/aws-sqs)
- [Google Pub/Sub](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/transports/google-pubsub)

## Domain & Event Sourcing

- [Domain Modeling](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/domain-modeling/): Aggregates, entities, value objects
- [Event Sourcing](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/event-sourcing/): Event stores, repositories, snapshots, projections

## Patterns

- [Outbox](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/patterns/outbox): Reliable messaging with transactional outbox
- [Inbox](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/patterns/inbox): Idempotent message processing
- [Dead Letter](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/patterns/dead-letter): Failed message handling
- [Claim Check](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/patterns/claim-check): Large payload offloading

## Data Providers

- [SQL Server](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/data-providers/sql-server)
- [Postgres](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/data-providers/Postgres)
- [CosmosDB](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/data-providers/cosmosdb)
- [MongoDB](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/data-providers/mongodb)

## Operations

- [Observability](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/observability/): OpenTelemetry metrics, tracing, health checks
- [Deployment](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/deployment/): ASP.NET Core, Docker, Kubernetes, serverless
- [Testing](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/testing/): Test utilities and strategies
- [Security](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/security/): Authentication, encryption, audit logging

## Migration

- [From MediatR](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/migration/from-mediatr): Step-by-step migration guide

## Architecture

- [Package Guide](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/package-guide): Package families and selection guide
- [Architecture Overview](https://docs.excalibur-dispatch.dev/docs/architecture/): Design decisions and patterns
